item.title: EXPRESSION Post-its â€“ playful experiment @MathWorks
item.description: BACKGROUND This project was carried out as a part of my employment with MathWorks India at MathWorks Design Team under the guidance of my co-workers Jyotirmaya Mohapatra and Praneet Kopula, . I was a User Experience Specialist for MathWorks, India . Collecting information on new users’ experiences with MATLAB and Simulink was one of the first assignments I was given. My task for this assignment would include, Sending invites to participants, Conducting interviews with each participant to learn about their experience using MATLAB and/or Simulink.
